org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners

类 SlidingTimeWindows

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners.WindowAssigner<Object,TimeWindow>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners.SlidingEventTimeWindows
        • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.windowing.assigners.SlidingTimeWindows
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable
    已过时。 
    Please use SlidingEventTimeWindows.

    @PublicEvolving
 @Deprecated
public class SlidingTimeWindows
extends SlidingEventTimeWindows
    A WindowAssigner that windows elements into sliding windows based on the timestamp of the elements. Windows can possibly overlap.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 方法详细资料

      • of

        @Deprecated
public static SlidingTimeWindows of(Time size,
                                                 Time slide)
        已过时。 Please use SlidingEventTimeWindows.of(Time, Time).
        Creates a new SlidingTimeWindows WindowAssigner that assigns elements to sliding time windows based on the element timestamp.
        参数:
        size - The size of the generated windows.
        slide - The slide interval of the generated windows.
        返回:
        The time policy.
